titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade and on the Great Lakes and their tributary and connecting waters in trade with Canada for each of 3 barges.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.4820.

bill.summary: 6/28/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue certificates of documentation for three named barges for employment in the coastwise trade and on the Great Lakes and their tributary and connecting waters in trade with Canada.
